text: Hianagi Jerusalemi kumapima mani'naza vahe'mo'za kesazana, havige'za hu'za ameneza tro nehaze hu'za antahigahaze. Hagi zamagra Jerusalemi vahe'ene Babiloni vahe'ene mago rimpama huno mani' keaga huke huvempa huna'anagi, Babiloni kini ne'mo'a kumima hu'naza zantera huzamagesa huno kina huzmanteno zamavareno vugahie.
